clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Investigated for use treatment in hepatitis viral C infectious and parasitic disease unspecified and tuberculosis

contraindications.disease: No adverse effects were observed in any patients participating in clinical trials
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: SCV 07 g D glutamyl L tryptophan is a novel synthetic dipeptide that acts broadly on the Toll like receptor pathway It has been shown to stimulate T lymphocyte differentiation macrocytic phagocytosis and specific immune responses and enhance IL 2 and INF g production
